sentences.en: Hypothermia is common among tramps sleeping outdoors.
sentences.cn: 体温过低症在那些露宿户外的流浪汉中很普遍。

sentences.en: There is the possibility that hypothermia can go unrecognized.
sentences.cn: 体温过低有可能不会被注意到。

sentences.en: Seek emergency help right away for possible hypothermia.
sentences.cn: 此时应迅速寻求急诊来救治可能的低体温症。
